about_the_game:
About Interwoven

Alrion has spent his entire life fighting in the Hundred Year War. Gylfie has spent hers safely tucked away from it. When the wheels of fate bring them together, two people from opposite walks of life are forced to discard everything they know about the other side, and work together to survive the elements, monsters, and a rogue taskforce that's hell-bent on hunting them down.



Play as Alrion and Gylfie in exhilarating simultaneous combat.

  • Strategize every encounter and master each character's individual skillsets.
  • Earn power boosts through fervent prayer to the Goddess of the land.
  • Play to each character's strengths and gain new skills as your bond increases.



Travel across the continent and protect your comrade. You can't do this alone.

  • Encounters with abhorrent creatures will test you and your companion.
  • Massive battles stack the odds against you.
  • Keep a watchful eye on the shadows. Anything can happen in the Austere Wilds.



Find out the true cause behind the Hundred Years War.

  • Compelling dialogue and story-telling will slowly reveal the true nature of this war.
  • Your journey across the continent will slowly reveal new bits of information that will turn the current narrative on its head.
  • Everything you think you know, may or may not be true.




Years on the battlefield have given Alrion keen senses and mastery over the art of swordplay. Down to earth and tough as nails, Alrion will never back down from a fight. However, his pride and lack of trust drives him to keep those around him at arms length.


A fledgling mage, Gylfie must use her surface knowledge of conjury to support her newfound companion. Kind to a fault, Gylfie will never refuse those in need. While she is not well-versed in conjury, her quick-thinking and strong faith makes her an effective all-rounder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or Equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Interwoven is a fantasy hack-and-slash centered around the peak of the Hundred Years' War. Join Alrion and Gylfie on a continental journey to escape an elite, rogue task force that seeks to capture them, dead or alive.
